description: portrait of Marguerite of Austria full length; wearing gown with puffed sleeves holding a rosary in her right hand and pointing with her left; bonnet on head; illustration from " A Generall Historie of the Netherlands" by Grimstone
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

above image in black: MARGVERITE OF AVSTRIA, DVT /-chess of Parma, bastard daughter to the Emperor Charles / the fifth, Gouernesse of the Netherlands for king Philip | below image in black: MARGARITA AUSTRIA DUCHISSA PARMAE/ BELGI. DITL. P. HISPA. REGI. NOMINA GUBER. | In plate, lower right in black: Sichem fecit | 12 lines in Englaish: Who ere he be.../...and did the place supply  MARGVERITE | at top of sheet in pencil: 398   2
title: Marguerite of Austria
